<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2792</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Write a Thank-you note for a gift.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Sie eine Thank-you Anmerkung für ein 
Geschenk.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écrivez une note merci pour un cadeau.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escreva uma nota thank-you para um presente.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ scriv un di ringraziamento nota per un regalo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψτε ότι σας ευχαριστώ σημειώστε για ένα δώρο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escriba una nota de agradecimiento para un regalo.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment, for an activity where studnets write a thank you note for a gift received.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expresion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung, für eine
Aktivität, in der studnets danken Sie schreiben zu beachten für ein 
empfangenes Geschenk.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation, pour une 
activité où les studnets vous écrivent à un remerciement pour 
noter d'un cadeau reçu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação, para uma
atividade onde os studnets o escrevam agradecer para anotar para um 
presente recebido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione, per 
un'attività dove gli studnets li scrivono ad un ringrazi per notare 
per un regalo ricevuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση, για μια 
δραστηριότητα όπου studnets γράψτε ότι ευχαριστήστε εσείς 
σημειώνει για ένα δώρο λαμβανόμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen, para una 
actividad donde los studnets le escriben a agradecimiento para 
observar por un regalo recibido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftliches expresion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
